trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see langword="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> or <see langword="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento <see langword="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" /> ou <see langword="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, you do not need to work with this delegate explicitly.
trans-unit.target: No Visual Basic, você não precisa trabalhar com este delegado explicitamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event or the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento ou <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.
